import React from 'react' import Layout from '../components/Layout' import '../App.css' import AuthContext from '../AuthContext' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import axios from 'axios' function TopicsEditPage(props) { const token = React.useContext(AuthContext) function handleSubmit(event) { event.preventDefault() const topic_id = event.target[0].value const name = event.target[1].value axios.put('/topics/edit', { token, topic_id, name }) .then((response) => { const data = response.data console.log(data) props.history.push('/topics') }) .catch((err) => {}) } return (
